title: Service Meshes Decoded: a performance comparison of Istio vs Linkerd vs Cilium
description: A performance comparison of three prominent Open Source service meshes Istio, Linkerd, and Cilium | Discovering the fastest service mesh and sharing our comparison experience
cntitle: 服务网格解码：Istio 与 Linkerd 与 Cilium 的性能比较
cndescription: 三个著名的开源服务网格 Istio、Linkerd 和 Cilium 的性能比较 | 发现最快的服务网格并分享我们的比较经验
